 Apocalypse turned to drillbit. "I know my old nemisis. Dont worry about me. 
I know how he thinks. He knows you have been put as sucsessor and wont like 
it. We must ban togeather and do this now. Get a hold of magma he will 
support us if he is given the right motavation also get sphink he has a link 
with the ship's controls. One of the selected few."
